text: KidsTv.
Uh-OH! Uh-Oh!
I spilled the apple juice, Uh-Oh
Mommy, I'm so sorry now the kitchen is a mess!

Honey, Don't worry
We'll clean it up in a hurry!

Next time be more careful,
But there's no need for distress!
I love you! This always will be true
Every single day I love you more! And more!

Uh-OH! Uh-Oh!
I broke the flowerpot, Uh-Oh!

Daddy, I'm so sorry!
Now the living room are mess!

Honey, don't worry
We'll clean it up in a hurry!

Flowerpots can be replaced
But not you, my princess!
I love you! This always will be true
Every single day I love you more! And more!

Uh-oh!, Uh-oh!
Our clothes are dirty now, Uh-oh!

Kiki must have stepped on them
They really are a mess!

Uhh-uhhh!  We caught you
In the back yard we saw you

Making little mud pies, 
So you might as well confess!
I love you! This always will be true
Every single day I love you more! And more!
I love you! This always will be true
Every single day I love you more! And more!
I love you! This always will be true
Every single day I love you more! And more!
And more!
